Flask-Permissions documentation
=============================================

Flask-Permissions is a simple Flask permissions extension that works with Flask-SQLAlchemy. It also plays nicely with Flask-Login although that isn't a strict requirement.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   API

==================
